snippet: Gary Woodland, one of the PGA Tour's longest hitters, used his length to his advantage and posted 5-under 67 in the first round of the P.G.A. Championship, putting him in a four-way tie for second place.
abstract: Gary Woodland, one of the PGA Tour's longest hitters, used his length to his advantage and posted 5-under 67 in the first round of the P.G.A. Championship, putting him in a four-way tie for second place.

headline.main: Big-Hitting Woodland Looks Comfortable on Ocean Course
